```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])


def preview_data(df):
    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        x='Random Numbers:Q',
        y='count()'
    )
    return [df.head(), histogram]


result = preview_data(data)
print(result[0])
result[1].show()

```
